apihelp-articlescores-summary: Allows actions to be taken for article scores
apihelp-articlescores-param-asaction: The article score action to invoke
apihelp-articlescores+getscoreinfo-summa: Get definition information about metrics and submetrics
apihelp-articlescores+getscoreinfo-param: If defined, will report if the user has permissions to change the submetric value for the page id
If defined, will report if the user has permissions to change the submetric value for the title
apihelp-articlescores+getscores-param-pa: The page ids to be included. Separate values with <kbd>|</kbd> or [[Special:ApiHelp/main#main/datatypes|alternative]].
apihelp-articlescores+getscores-param-ti: The titles to be included. Separate values with <kbd>|</kbd> or [[Special:ApiHelp/main#main/datatypes|alternative]].
apihelp-articlescores+getscores-param-us: Should userscores be included in results
apihelp-articlescores+getscores-param-de: Should default values be included in results
apihelp-articlescores+setscore-param-pag: The page id of the article
apihelp-articlescores+setscore-param-met: The metric id of the score
apihelp-articlescores+setscore-param-sub: The submetric id of the score
